data.text: Jisu'n Jericho rakaanna aleisi.
Khawa khan araming Zacchaeus inti pasal inkhat aleiom, ama kha rampar kakhoom kalok khat-um inchong mi inkhat kha alei eii.
Ama'n Jisu kha tume tihi ajetzoot jarra alei enzoot, takkha amahi mi inniam alei eii, khat-um mipui katamtak in inlei-uum jarra Jisu kha leimu matormak.
Khale inruoiya ama'n Jisu kha amuzoot jarra inmani matiang ataanna Jisu'n rakaannasik lamkhan theibajil kuung kha aleikalla aleiom.
Jisu'n khawa muunkha hongtung phakhan, chungtiang ahong enna aleitipi, “Zacchaeus innoottheiya juochumro awini kei'n nangna innna kaomsik eii.”
Khale inruoiya ama'n innoottheiya ajuochumma karok tak ah Jisu kha aleidonna, inntiang leiruoijei.
Halli mi rakip in inmupha khan, inraya ah nemnum inleiti “Hiwa mihi manu karoonpa inna khuol mi ka-esik asijei!”

Zacchaeus in a-ngirra Pumi diang aheiti, “Rangairo karu! Kei kaneinaak herkhat hi sara ngaidiang kapejei, halli kei'n mi ngai neinaak maleisei kathoa kaleidel ngai leisuok inchu tum mili kheella kapekir nooksik eii.”
Halli Jisu'n amadiang aheiti, “Awini hiwa innsuung hin Sanminringna juotuungjei, tichu ama hium Abraham phungrui eii.
Ajarchu Miring sapa kajuohi akamangngai kaentok khat-um kasanringsik kajuo eii.” Matt 18:10
Halli inmani'n hingai rakip inrangai phakhan, Jisu'n Jerusalem aheinaiya hiwa minkhinahi aleirilpinook, halli Pathian Rengram hi atuuntak juosik angjei tia inmani'n inleingaidon.

Khawa jarra Jisu'n ati, “Miring inkhat kalokthei choun karoon inkhat aleiom halli ama'n Reng inkhat inchangnasik ah ram kalaaktak inkhat ah aleisi, reng changsuoli inntiang hongkir nooksik tia aleingaidon.
Halli ama'n asuok soom ngaikha akoiya Minas soomhi inmani diang aleipei, halli inmani diang ati, ‘Hiwa Minas hi kaheikir maklaiseng nangni'n hiwahi leiminweiru.’
Takkha amahi ami ngaitak in enzootmuwa ama nuk ah taangwa ngai inleiminsiya ‘Hiwa mipa hi keini reng ka-esik hi manuommung katisik ah inleiminsi.’ ”
“Halli mipa kha reng eya aheikir jei, ama'n Minas hi angjetme inleiminwei ennasik-ah asuok ngaikha ama koolla heiwanasik-ah chong aleiminpeii.
Halli mansakhet suokpa khan ama koolla aheiwa ah ati ‘Karu, nang i-napeii Mina inkhat in Mina soom kaleiminweijei.’
Halli ama'n ati, ‘Thajei’ ‘Akatha suokpa! Ajarchu nang in kasiinteii chuonna ngamna katha na-e jarra, khuopui soom karoon etaro.’
‘Inni huuina suokpa khan heiwa ah ati, Karu, nang mina inkhat in Mina ra-nga kaleiminweijei.’
Halli amadiang um ati, ‘Nang um khuopui ra-nga karoon etaro.’
‘Suok inkhat innum heiwa ah ati, Karu, puonna kakhit rep ah kida nang Mina kha hin omjei.
Kei'n nangkha kanachi ajarchu malung kathamak na-eii, nang nata ka-emak nang in nalei khat-um na i-wormak kha nang in narakhool.’
Ama'n suokpa diang ati, ‘E suok kathamak! nang inrilsuok chong in chongtanna kananeisik! kata ka-emak kha kalei, khat-um ka i-wormak kha karakhool tia kei kamalung kathamak hi nang in nalei jetjei.
Kha e-inle angjarra nang in kei Mina hi nilei minwei makme? Naleiminwei inchu kei'n kaheikir phakhan Mina niminwei khale inruoiya juoleimak ningngabe?’
Halli khawa khanna kangir ngaidiang aleitipi, ama diangnga kaom ‘Mina hi kasut inlang, Mina soom kanei suokpa diang peru.’
Halli inmani'n ama diang inti ‘Karu, ama chu Mina soom aneijei!’
‘Kei'n nangnidiang kanati,’ ‘katamma kaneipa diang kheella inpesik eii, takkha i-teii kaneimakpa diang chu i-nei lekteii khaum inleidelsik eii. Matt 13:12; Mk 4:25; Luk 8:18
Takkha keihi inmani chungnga in-reng kanamin ezootmak kei nanhalpui mi ngaikha heiruoi inlang kamaikuungnga thatru!’ ”
Hiwa arilsuoli Jerusalem tiang Jisu'n ma sa-ah aleisi.
Halli ama'n Olives chingbung koolla kaom Bethphage li Bethany ahongnai phakhan, asiamruoi inni diang hintipili ma minsa-ah aleitir,
“Ningma ah kaom khuo khan siru khat-um ningluut phakhan, tuteii in inlachuongmak salungdai teii inthungnga kaomkha muningte, suut inlang hin juoruoiru.
Halli tu ka-ang mi'n nangnidiang salungdai hi angsik-ah ningsuutme tia innarakel inchu, nangni'n hin tipiru, Karu sik19:31: Karu emakli amapupa, ah arei om.”
Khale inruoiya inmani'n insipha khan Jisu'n irilpi angnga injuomujei.
Halli inmani'n salungdai teii kha insuutpha khan amapupa'n aleiti, “Angsik ah ningsuutme?”
Inmani'n inleimasang, “Karu diang arei ompiya eii.”
Inmani'n salungdai kha Jisu diang inheiruoi, Inpuondiar kha salungdai chungnga indaap ah Jisu kha inleiminchuong.
Jisu'n achuongnga aheiwa phakhan, inmanin gai'n inpuon ngaikha lamma inleithapi.
Ama'n Olives chingmuol makheiya juochumma Jerusalem ajuonai phakhan, anuk kajui mipui rakip in Pathian chountho kalokkha inleimu phakhan inkheek ah inleiminpaak ah inti,
“Pumi ramingnga kajuo Renghi rawaan katha eii! marwaanna kadai erase halli lurna kha insaangkhet erase!” Minpkla 118:26
Halli mipui karra Pharisee lekkhat in inti, “Karu,” “Nasiamruoi ngaihi omchian nasik ranro!”
Ama'n aleimasang, “Kei'n nangnidiang kitihi eii, inmani'n inomchian inchu, hiwa lung ngai'n inhongkheek sik eii.”
Jisu'n Jerusalem khuopui aheinai phakhan, ama'n amuli aleichappuiya ati,
“Nang in awini nikhuo hin kadai munasik chuon nalajet limbe! takkha atuunchu nang in munutinjei!
Ajarchu nachungnga hiwa ka-ang nikhuo ngaihi asuoksik eii, khawakha e-inchu nang inhalpui ngai'n rakul bool-inta nangkha nakahin inta araki miliya nangkha innakhumsik eii.

Halli nang khat-um rakul sungnga kaom nang mi ngaikha innathasik eii, halli rakul suungnga kaom lung inkam ngaikha inmani'n minkamma danunujei, ajarchu Pathian in nangni kanasan ajuolai khan leijet makchujei!”
Halli Jisu'n biak-inn aheiluut ah neinaak kajuorngai khat-um karachuo ngaikha kapuutsuok aleiphut ah,
Inmani diang aleiti, “Hinthoa Pathian chongnga injiajei, ‘Kei biak-inn chu Pathian nina mun esik eii.’ Takkha nangni'n inruup ngai inthupna mun ningminchangjei.”Isa 56:7; Jer 7:11
Khat-um Jisu'n biak-inna nisuo rakip aleiminchu, thiampu kalian, Dan karu khat-um mipui lamkakei ngai'n ama kha thatnasik-ah inlei-ensui. Luk 21:37
Takkha inmani'n iteii thomator nasik lam leimumu, ajarchu mipui'n ama chongril kha katha tak ah inleirangai.
